| HistoryText             = 
Alpha Prime was the name [[Vindicator (Heather Hudson)|Heather Hudson]] coined for the three outcasts she banded together with while she was stranded in the [[Savage Land]], [[Antarctica]]. With her leadership, these three misfits became the protectors of the people who tried to persecute them.{{r|Alpha Flight Annual #2}}
